name: Project 42 Geuldoche
description:
Hello!

Me and a friend are working on this new game.

The game is going to be a first person RPG where you manage a town and gather resources. You will have to explore different regions to complete quests and upgrade your town.

If you are interested you can follow the development on my YouTube channel.

And if you have any bug of glitch, let me know!

Thank you!

Controls:
ESC = Toggle mouse control
WASD = Move
Space = Jump

*If you fall into the void, you need to restart the game.
